scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.test: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:coverage" "cd frontend && npm run coverage"
